p: The first excavations at the Pilauco site in 2007 followed the discovery there of a rich assemblage of mammalian fossils. To facilitate archaeological and paleontological investigations, the site was divided into a horizontal grid composed of 1-m 2 elements, and the vertical sedimentary sequence was subdivided into lithostratigraphic units designated PB-6 through PB-9 (Supplementary Fig.Â S1).
